entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
